resources.string: The database could not be opened.
Unable to access information in the database.
External storage media is not mounted.
The desired folder is protected, TEdit will not be able to write to this file.
TEdit was unable to open the file.
Move to the the parent directory.
View the list of currently open documents.

Close the browser. If you have one or more open documents this will switch to the last open document otherwise, this will quit the TEdit application. Using the back button will perform the same action.
Save a copy of the current document.

Close the current document. If more than one document is open this will switch to one of the other open documents otherwise, this will switch to the file browser. Using the back button will perform the same action.
Swipe any item left or right to close the respective text file.
Close the tabs view. If more than one document is open this will switch to the last open document otherwise, this will switch to the file browser. Using the back button will perform the same action.
